tool_description: Validates passenger information for flight booking including names, contact details, and ensures data meets airline and regulatory requirements.

passengers.description: Array of passenger information strings in format: FirstName LastName

contact_phone.description: Primary contact phone number with country code

passenger_ages.description: Array of passenger ages in years

emergency_contact.description: Emergency contact name and phone in format: Name Phone

error_messages: Invalid passenger name format: Use 'FirstName LastName' format for each passenger entry.
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address for contact_email.
Invalid phone format: Include country code and valid phone number format.
Age validation error: All passenger ages must be between 0 and 120.
Data mismatch: Number of passengers must match number of ages provided.
usage: Provide passengers array with names, contact_email, contact_phone, and passenger_ages. Optionally include emergency_contact information.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: valid, invalid, or warning

validation_errors.description: Array of validation error messages if any

passenger_categories.description: Array of passenger categories: adult, child, infant
